summary: Table CSV file is used for importing and exporting table metadata from and to an **existing** table.

headers.name: name
headers.description: The name of the entity being updated.

headers.name: description
headers.description: Description for the entity in Markdown format.
examples: `Customer Table` that contains all customer records.
`user_id` column is the primary key and contains unique user ID.

headers.name: owner
headers.description: Owner names separated by ';'. For team owner, include prefix team. For user owner, include prefix user.

headers.name: tags
headers.description: Fully qualified classification tag names associated with the entity separated by ';'.. These tags are automatically applied along with the glossary term, when it is used to label an entity.

headers.name: glossaryTerms
headers.description: Fully qualified glossary term names associated with the entity separated by ';'. Tags derived from the glossary term are automatically applied.

headers.name: tiers
headers.description: Fully qualified tier tags names associated with the entity separated by ';'.

headers.name: retentionPeriod
headers.description: Retention period of the data. Period is expressed as duration in ISO 8601 format in UTC. Example - `P23DT23H`. When not set, the retention period is inherited from the parent, if it exists.

headers.name: domain
headers.description: Domain to which the entity belongs to

headers.name: extension
headers.description: Custom property values added to the entity. Each field value (property and its value) is separated by `;` and internal values can be separated by `|`.

headers.name: column.dataTypeDisplay
headers.description: Display name used for dataType. This is useful for complex types, such as `array<int>`, `map<int,string>`, `struct<>`, and union types.

headers.name: column.arrayDataType
headers.description: In case of data Type being Array, type of Array Data.

headers.name: column.dataLength
headers.description: Data Length of Column in case of CHAR, VARCHAR, BINARY etc.

headers.name: entityType
headers.description: Type of entity being imported or exported. Used to determine how to process the record during import/export operations.

headers.name: fullyQualifiedName
headers.description: The fully qualified name of the entity. If not provided, it will be constructed based on the hierarchy.
